subject: Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: George M. Steinbrenner privately financed the new Yankee Stadium, with the exception of taxpayer-financed infrastructure upgrades and a land grab with costs best measured in cruelty.
snippet: George M. Steinbrenner privately financed the new Yankee Stadium, with the exception of taxpayer-financed infrastructure upgrades and a land grab with costs best measured in cruelty.
